overview: Volume 9 of the ultimate horror collection following Kazuto Kodama's "The Real Deal! Cursed Videos" (Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video).  A group of college students, take pictures while pulling a prank on their friend. However, when an ominous presence appears, unforseen events start to happen.  "Confession" mere one of the 5 episodes collected on this volume.
title: Tokyo Videos of Horror 9
